about_the_game:
Magnificent-1 is a 2D top-down arcade game about Sci-fi space dogfights with semi-realistic physics playing a vital role in dogfighting! The game features simple mechanics that allow for several layers of complexity with maneuvers such as flying backward. Pilot your fighter, re-arm and refuel in space and prove that you are worthy of your call sign.

[Warning: Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.]

Enjoy the story mode of an elite pilot bearing the Magnificent-1 call sign as they try to survive in the reality of space warfare. Read e-mails, briefings, and lore entries to get to know your place in the conflict.

Key features:

  • Semi-realistic 2D physics.
  • 13 Fully-voiced story missions.
  • 10 Arcade missions with different spacecraft to pilot.
  • Pixel-art graphics.
  • Military Sci-Fi setting.

Universe

The sudden and unexpected collapse of an Old Civilization has left the galaxy shattered and divided. Many planets were left for themselves in their test of sudden independence. From these shattered pieces, Everlasting Republics have emerged led by the Ardassian Republic in an attempt to reunify mankind.


However, not everyone can peacefully accept the new power structure, with the Separatist Alliance forcefully trying to secede from the yet establishing new order. The conflict has thrown the still recovering galaxy into a brutal war that will shape mankind's future.



"Ready to give them hell Magnificent-1?"

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains numerous instances of strong language.

short_description: Get into the cockpit of an ace pilot fighting in the galactic war in this sci-fi arcade top-down shooter. Participate in numerous campaign missions to explore the story of Magnificent-1 and enjoy the arcade mode to strive for the highest score.
